title: biomarkers_and_covariates
description: Array of all biomarkers and covariates of the given profile.

biomarker.description: Name of the biomarker or covariate.

observations.title: observations

observation_numeric.description: Numeric value of the biomarker or covariate observation.

observation_blq.description: Biomarker or covariate observation is below the LLOQ.

observation_string.description: Non-numeric value of the biomarker or covariate observation.

time_unit.description: Unit of time point for the biomarker or covariate observations.

observation_unit.description: Unit of  the biomarker or covariate observations.

compartment.description: Compartment, where the biomarker or covariate observations were made.

organ.description: Organ or tissue, where the biomarker or covariate observations were made.

matrix.description: Matrix where the biomarker or covariate observations were made.

lloq.description: Lower limit of quantification in the same unit as the biomarker or covariate observations.

observation_description.description: Description of the biomarker or covariate observation. I.e., Measurements of heart rate.
